Text: Thank you so much for posting this brings back fond memories.....I was all OMFG when both the Flash and Dove bought it in this

This series was from an era unlike today when creators tried for perfection and comics usually were a good fun read. 
Would be great to see an animated feature of this comic but they couldnt do it justice. 
This was George Perez at his best.
maraming salamat! thank you very much!
The original is still the best.

And then, 20 years later, DC went and dipped into the same well with INFINITE CRISIS and finally, 2 years later; FINAL CRISIS.

All or most of the continuity PRE-CRISIS gets brought back into current continuity (before the great reboot - The New 52 or The ENNUI 52)!!!

Oh, the headaches!  ;-)

Thanks for the ul, blackcanary, it's still a proven solid classic that withstands the times.
beautiful set blackcanary! Dobis and Pudgy should be proud of all these high-quality scans. nice touch remembering the Legends of the DCU follow-up, too. thanks!
thanks for uploading these. if this is supposed to be on of the greatest crossovers ever, how come there aren't at least 143 tie-in books to go with it?
i'm sure no one cares, but when I wrote that last comment, I didn't know there actually were a bunch of tie-ins. oh well, the way they do so many crossovers now is still ridiculous
